node.title: The Long Awaited Adventist Revival, Part 1
node.description: What's the story of missed opportunities for the latter-day revival by the church? What does it take to experience personal and church revival? What will revival by the Holy Spirit look like in the church? Discover the answers to these questions and more as Dr. Clouzet relates a fascinating and inspiring Bible and Spirit of Prophecy filled story that will bring conviction and surrender to your heart.
